mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.parent_id AS "parent.id", p.name AS "parent.name", a.parent_ids AS "parentIds", a.name AS "name", a.expression AS "expression", a.description AS "description", a.alpha AS "alpha", a.beta AS "beta", a.gamma AS "gamma", a.delte AS "delte", a.epsilon AS "epsilon", a.sort AS "sort", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", uu.name AS "updateBy.name", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN sys_user uu ON uu.id = a.update_by LEFT JOIN mod_phase p ON p.id = a.parent_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mod_phase( id, parent_id, parent_ids, name, expression, description, alpha, beta, gamma, delte, epsilon, sort, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{parent.id}, #{parentIds}, #{name}, #{expression}, #{description}, #{alpha}, #{beta}, #{gamma}, #{delte}, #{epsilon}, #{sort}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE mod_phase SET parent_id = #{parent.id}, parent_ids = #{parentIds}, name = #{name}, expression = #{expression}, description = #{description}, alpha = #{alpha}, beta = #{beta}, gamma = #{gamma}, delte = #{delte}, epsilon = #{epsilon}, sort=#{sort}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE mod_phase SET del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_DELETE} WHERE id = #{id} OR parent_ids LIKE '%,'||#{id}||',%' '%,'+#{id}+',%' CONCAT('%,', #{id}, ',%')
